# SentinelHelper.NotEmpty method

Performs a test on the method argument, and throws an exception of type ArgumentException if the specified value is empty.

```csharp
public static string NotEmpty(string value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | Target value |

## Return Value

Returns same *value* if it is not empty.

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ArgumentException | If the *value* is null or empty. |
